description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a man in an open coffin leaning forward trying to touch his toes
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. Japan. / E.64 | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: #1929
portfolio: From Plate 10 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel
title: Akaki in a Coffin Made of Spruce Wood, Plate 10 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
